testsuite.name: com.coffee.api.CoffeeTest

testcase.name: API returns 400 on POST request with invalid data()

testsuite.system-out:
***** REQUEST: POST: /coffees ***** POST /coffees HTTP/1.1
{"coffeeName":"Colombian Single Origin","roastedBy":"My Coffee Company"} 15:58:11.867 [Test worker] DEBUG Exposed -- SELECT roaster.id, roaster."name", roaster.url, roaster.address FROM roaster WHERE roaster."name" = 'My Coffee Company' ***** RESPONSE 400 to POST: /coffees ***** Roaster not found 400 Bad Request
